snippet: For those not content with commemorative T-shirts and hats, the state is selling official Super Bowl XLVI license plates.
abstract: For those not content with commemorative T-shirts and hats, the state is selling official Super Bowl XLVI license plates.
lead_paragraph: ALBANY - The New York State Department of Motor Vehicles is doing its part to celebrate the Giants' Super Bowl victory.

headline.main: If You Love the New York Giants, Don't Honk, but Spend $60
